basics.name: John Munson
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: John hails from Bloomington, IL. He has earned a degree from Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology. (Go Fightin' Engineers!) Before entering the field of web development, he worked in Washington, D.C. as a construction manager, mostly focused on overseeing the completion of bridge and metrorail projects. While his work now focuses on fullstack web development, with a focus on React and Node, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He'd love to buy you a coffee or beer and tell you all about it!

work.summary: Shirley Contracting is a heavy civil general contractor based in Northern Virginia. Many of their projects involve new bridge contstruction or rehabilitation, highway widening, multi-modal transportation, utility relocation, and sometimes keystone features such as arches and tunnels.
highlights: Managed dozens of crews and subcontractors
Tracked costs and budget for $20M+ dollar projects
Analyzed plans and design codes to provide stakeholders with a quality product

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Cole Allan
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend John, his performance working as a developer for Brewbase proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
